headline.main: Hospitals Focus on Doing No Harm

docs.abstract: Hospitals across the United States are trying, in systematic ways, to reduce the risk of infection and other preventable dangers that can leave patients in worse shape after their stay.
docs.snippet: Hospitals across the United States are trying, in systematic ways, to reduce the risk of infection and other preventable dangers that can leave patients in worse shape after their stay.

docs.lead_paragraph: Rising homicide rates are lowering a country’s average life expectancy.

headline.main: Reverberations From a Rise in Mexico’s Murder Rate

docs.abstract: Study in journal Health Affairs finds rising homicide rates in Mexico have influenced average life expectancy for Mexican men aged 15 to 50, causing it to fall by 0.6 percent from 2005 to 2010.
docs.snippet: Rising homicide rates are lowering a country’s average life expectancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: Growth cracks can originate during the growth period from uneven moisture. As to the safety of cracked carrots, common sense should be the rule.

headline.main: Does a Crack in a Carrot Spell Ruin for the Root Vegetable?
headline.print_headline: When Carrots Show Their Growing Pains

docs.abstract: Science Q&A explains why some carrots have deep splits or cracks, and whether they are safe to eat in such condition.
docs.snippet: Growth cracks can originate during the growth period from uneven moisture. As to the safety of cracked carrots, common sense should be the rule.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Syrian government on Monday approved a United Nations request for new aid deliveries to the besieged towns of Madaya, Foua and Kfarya where hundreds of civilians are facing severe malnutrition and some have starved to death.

headline.main: UN: Syria Approves Aid Deliveries to 3 Besieged Villages
headline.print_headline: UN: Syria Approves Aid Deliveries to 3 Besieged Villages

docs.snippet: The Syrian government on Monday approved a United Nations request for new aid deliveries to the besieged towns of Madaya, Foua and Kfarya where hundreds of civilians are facing severe malnutrition and some have starved to death.

headline.main: An Eating Disorder in People With Diabetes

docs.abstract: Diabulimia occurs when people with Type 1 diabetes manipulate their insulin in order to purge calories, much as someone with bulimia might induce vomiting.
docs.snippet: Diabulimia occurs when people with Type 1 diabetes manipulate their insulin in order to purge calories, much as someone with bulimia might induce vomiting.

docs.lead_paragraph: Running concierges, a hotel mini bar stocked with produce from the local farmers market and a training wall that comes standard in every room. The hotel industry is moving beyond basement gyms and basic spa menus to accommodate guests' growing requests to stay healthy while on the road.

headline.main: Hotels Expand Options to Keep Guests Healthy on the Road
headline.print_headline: Hotels Expand Options to Keep Guests Healthy on the Road

docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations said on Monday the Syrian government has approved "in principle" a U.N. request for an aid delivery to the besieged Syrian towns of Madaya, al-Foua and Kefraya.

headline.main: Syrian Government Approves 'in Principle' U.N. Aid Request for Besieged Towns
headline.print_headline: Syrian Government Approves 'in Principle' U.N. Aid Request for Besieged Towns

docs.snippet: The United Nations said on Monday the Syrian government has approved "in principle" a U.N. request for an aid delivery to the besieged Syrian towns of Madaya, al-Foua and Kefraya.
